text: @SenSchumer tRUMP was tested twice for a HOAX that was suppose to miraculously disappear in April. His EPA is busy not enforcing anti pollution laws during the coronavirus crisis. A CESSPOOL for diseases to breed in from sea to shiny sea. WHAT TESTS?
